price: (74) They have not appraised Allāh with true appraisal.[944] Indeed, Allāh is Powerful and Exalted in Might.
arabic: مَا قَدَرُواْ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ قَدۡرِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَقَوِيٌّ عَزِيزٌ
footnotes: [944]- They have not assessed Him with the assessment due to Him, meaning that they did not take into account His perfect attributes.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: mā qadarū al-laha ḥaqqa qadrihi inna al-laha laqawiyyun ʿazīzun
